Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
Playground
A visual language for children, developed for Apple's Vivarium Project. OOPSLA 89 or 90?

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Playground \Play"ground`\, n. A piece of ground used for recreation; as, the playground of a school. [1913 Webster]
playground n 1: an area where many people go for recreation [syn: {resort area}, {vacation spot}] 2: yard consisting of an outdoor area for children's play
